img_summary: The image depicts the "Nine-Capped Lingzhi," a rare ingredient in the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*. It is associated with Purple Lingzhi plants and can be obtained by defeating Lingzhiling enemies. The item appears to play a role in crafting or progression within the game, as it is grouped with other collectible ingredients like Gentian and Ginseng, which are found or purchased in specific locations.
